name: Pumpkin Princess: Curse of the Pumpkin Patch
name_original: Pumpkin Princess: Curse of the Pumpkin Patch
description:
Controls :

  • Z to Jump
  • X to Attack
  • C to Dash 
  • Arrow keys to move. 

You can wall climb and wall slide by pressing Z and the left or right arrow keys against a wall to climb up!

IMPORTANT: In order to reach the next level you must touch the last wall / end of the level!!

Deep within the pumpkin patch, lies a cursed princess wakes up alone in an abandoned castle. Confused and accompanied only by a carving knife given to her by her mother, the princess must make her way out alive. Little does she know, she’s not the only who was cursed...

Made by 5 CS students new to Unity.
